title: My bank account been levied by Capital One's collection firm. There is a judgment from the court. Is there anything I can do now
question: I was making payments through a wage garnishment and when I left my job, I neglected to follow up and setup new arrangements
answers: If the judgment amount is large enough, you could also consider bankruptcy. Get a consultation with a bankruptcy attorney near you, to see if it makes sense in your situation.

Go to Self Help desk at courthouse and file Claim of Exemption.
http://www.courts.ca.gov/documents/wg006.pdf
Your accounts will remain vulnerable.
Judgment creditors can use all means to collect its debt. You can, however, assert your personal property exemptions for the funds in your bank account.
